verses.verse: וַֽעֲתַלְיָה֙ <WH6271> And when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <WH517> the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah [וּרָאֲתָה כ] (רָאֲתָ֖ה <WH7200> advise self ק) כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <WH1121> that her son וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> she arose וַתְּאַבֵּ֔ד <WH6> and destroyed אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> royal

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took יְהוֹשֶׁ֣בַע <WH3089> But Jehosheba בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of king י֠וֹרָם <WH3141> Joram אֲח֨וֹת <WH269> sister אֲחַזְיָ֜הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> Joash בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗ה <WH274> of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <WH1589> and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> מִתּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's [הַמַּמֹותְתִים כ] (הַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <WH4191> put ק) אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵינִקְתּ֖וֹ <WH3243> him [even] him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <WH2315> chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <WH4296> bed וַיַּסְתִּ֧רוּ <WH5641> and they hid אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH6271> Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> were being הוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> [which were] slain

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become אִתָּהּ֙ <WH854> her in בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <WH2244> And he was with her hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <WH6271> And Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <WH4427> did reign עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> over the land פ

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִית <WH7637> And the seventh שָׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <WH3077> Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח ׀ <WH3947> and fetched אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the rulers [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <WH3967> hundred ק) לַכָּרִי֙ <WH3746> with the captains וְלָ֣רָצִ֔ים <WH7323> and the guard וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> and brought אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> them to him into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <WH3772> and made לָהֶ֨ם <WH1992> like בְּרִ֜ית <WH1285> a covenant וַיַּשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> with them and took an oath אֹתָם֙ <WH854> in בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of them in the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> and shewed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> them the king's

וַיְצַוֵּ֣ם <WH6680> And he commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> them saying זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּן <WH6213> that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֤ית <WH7992> A third part מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> who בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> of you that enter in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וְשֹׁ֣מְרֵ֔י <WH8104> shall even be keepers מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> of the watch בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> And a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> [shall be] at the gate ס֔וּר <WH5495> of Sur וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֥ית <WH7992> and a third part בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> at the gate אַחַ֣ר <WH310> behind הָרָצִ֑ים <WH7323> the guard וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֛ם <WH8104> so shall ye keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the watch הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house מַסָּֽח׃ <WH4535> that it be not broken down

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> And two הַיָּדוֹת֙ <WH3027> parts בָּכֶ֔ם כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of you all יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> of all you that go forth הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וְשָֽׁמְר֛וּ <WH8104> even they shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the watch בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וְהִקַּפְתֶּ֨ם <WH5362> And ye shall compass עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <WH3627> with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> and he that cometh אֶל־ <WH413> within הַשְּׂדֵר֖וֹת <WH7713> within the ranges יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> let him be slain וִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH854> and be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and be ye with the king בְּצֵאת֥וֹ <WH3318> as he goeth out וּבְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH935> and as he cometh in

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <WH6213> did שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And the captains [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <WH3967> hundred ק) כְּכֹ֣ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּה֮ <WH6680> commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> according to all [things] that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <WH3548> the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> and they took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> one בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> on the sabbath עִ֖ם <WH5973> were to יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> with them that should go out הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <WH3077> to Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> give הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> did the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And to the captains [הַמֵּאיֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֗ות <WH3967> hundred ק) אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲנִית֙ <WH2595> spears וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <WH7982> and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> that [were] in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּעַמְד֨וּ <WH5975> stood הָרָצִ֜ים <WH7323> And the guard אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <WH3627> with his weapons בְּיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> corner הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <WH3233> from the right עַד־ <WH5704> against כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> corner הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <WH8042> to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> [along] by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> and the temple עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <WH3318> And he brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> and put עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <WH5145> the crown וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <WH5715> upon him and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֥כוּ <WH4427> and they made him king אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֑הוּ <WH4886> and anointed וַיַּכּוּ־ <WH5221> him and they clapped כָ֔ף <WH3709> their hands וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said יְחִ֥י <WH2421> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king ס

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard עֲתַלְיָ֔ה <WH6271> And when Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the noise הָֽרָצִ֖ין <WH7323> of the guard הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> [and] of the people וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> she came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> to the people בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַתֵּ֡רֶא <WH7200> And when she looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> behold the king עֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> stood עַֽל־ <WH5921> by הָעַמּ֜וּד <WH5982> by a pillar כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> as the manner וְהַשָּׂרִ֤ים <WH8269> [was] and the princes וְהַחֲצֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH2689> and the trumpeters אֶל־ <WH413> beside הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֤ם <WH5971> and all the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land שָׂמֵ֔חַ <WH8056> rejoiced וְתֹקֵ֖עַ <WH8628> and blew בַּחֲצֹֽצְר֑וֹת <WH2689> with trumpets וַתִּקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> rent עֲתַלְיָה֙ <WH6271> and Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדֶ֔יהָ <WH899> her clothes וַתִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and cried קֶ֥שֶׁר <WH7195> Treason קָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH7195> Treason ס

וַיְצַו֩ <WH6680> commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> But Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> the captains [הַמֵּיאֹות כ] (הַמֵּאֹ֣ות <WH3967> hundred ק) פְּקֻדֵ֣י <WH6485> the officers הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> of the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> to הוֹצִ֤יאוּ <WH3318> unto them Have her forth אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> in מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> without לַשְּׂדֵרֹ֔ת <WH7713> the ranges וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> abide אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <WH310> after that הָמֵ֣ת <WH4191> her kill בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> had said הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> For the priest אַל־ <WH408> nay תּוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> Let her not be slain בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּשִׂ֤מוּ <WH7760> And they laid לָהּ֙ יָדַ֔יִם <WH3027> hands וַתָּב֛וֹא <WH935> on her and she went דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> by the way מְב֥וֹא <WH3996> came הַסּוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> by the which the horses בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> into the king's וַתּוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> and there was she slain שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there ס

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <WH3772> made יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <WH3077> And Jehoiada אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> a covenant בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> between the LORD וּבֵ֤ין <WH996> between הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and the king וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and the people לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לְעָ֖ם <WH5971> people לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that they should be the LORD'S וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> between the king וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> also and the people

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> went כָל־ <WH3605> All עַם֩ <WH5971> And all the people הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> of the land בֵּית־ <WH1004> into the house הַבַּ֜עַל <WH1168> of Baal וַֽיִּתְּצֻ֗הוּ <WH5422> and brake it down אֶת־ <WH853> [מִזְבְּחֹתֹו כ] (מִזְבְּחֹתָ֤יו <WH4196> his altars ק) וְאֶת־ <WH853> צְלָמָיו֙ <WH6754> and his images שִׁבְּר֣וּ <WH7665> brake they in pieces הֵיטֵ֔ב <WH3190> thoroughly וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> מַתָּן֙ <WH4977> Mattan כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> the priest הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal הָרְג֖וּ <WH2026> and slew לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַֽמִּזְבְּח֑וֹת <WH4196> his altars וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> appointed הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest פְּקֻדּ֖וֹת <WH6486> officers עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> over the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the rulers הַ֠מֵּאוֹת <WH3967> over hundreds וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכָּרִ֨י <WH3746> and the captains וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָצִ֜ים <WH7323> and the guard וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֣ם <WH5971> and all the people הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיֹּרִ֤ידוּ <WH3381> and they brought down אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּב֛וֹאוּ <WH935> and came דֶּֽרֶך־ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> of the gate הָרָצִ֖ים <WH7323> of the guard בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king's וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> And he sat עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> on the throne הַמְּלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> of the kings

וַיִּשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> rejoiced כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַם־ <WH5971> And all the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and the city שָׁקָ֑טָה <WH8252> was in quiet וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲתַלְיָ֛הוּ <WH6271> Athaliah הֵמִ֥יתוּ <WH4191> and they slew בַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> with the sword בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house [מֶלֶךְ כ] (הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> king ק) ס
בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> Seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years יְהוֹאָ֥שׁ <WH3060> [was] Jehoash בְּמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <WH4427> when he began to reign פ
